format.name: SentenceCountChecker
format.description: The argument value must have at least 4 sentences. Each sentence should be properly punctuated.

fn_schema.name: compose_email_response
fn_schema.description: Composes an automatic email response based on the user's query and specified parameters.

user_query.description: The user's original email query or request needing a response. The argument value must have at least 4 sentences, and each sentence should be properly punctuated.

response_tone.description: Desired tone of the email response.

include_attachments.description: Indicator if the response should include attachments. Defaults to False.

user_queries: I recently received an email from a client who is requesting an update on their project status. Their message reads: "Hi, I wanted to check in on the progress of my website redesign. Could you let me know how things are coming along and whether there are any updates or issues I should be aware of? Also, do you have a timeline for the next steps?" Could you please help me craft a detailed and formal response to this email, and make sure to include any relevant attachments to support the update?

A customer just contacted my support inbox with the following: "Hello team, I am not able to log in to my account despite resetting the password several times. Can you help me resolve this issue?" I'd appreciate it if you could generate a concise and informal reply for me to send back, and I don't think attachments are necessary for this response.

I got this message from a job applicant: "Dear hiring manager, I am following up on the status of my application for the Marketing Coordinator position. I submitted my materials two weeks ago and wanted to see if there are any updates or further steps involved in the process." Please write a formal, concise reply addressing their query and let me know if attachments should be included in the response or not—I would prefer not to attach documents this time.

There's an email from a colleague in my inbox that says: "Hey, do you have a copy of last month’s sales report? If so, could you send it over along with any key highlights or findings? Would love a quick update." Please create a detailed but informal response for me and be sure to include the reports as attachments in the reply.

A vendor just wrote: "Good morning, just checking in about the invoice I submitted on May 2nd. Can you confirm receipt and let me know when payment will be processed? Also, do I need to provide any additional paperwork?" Could you generate a formal and detailed response for me, and please make sure to attach any necessary supporting documents referenced in the conversation?
